channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2023111032
item.description:
Report X-2023111032

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: ENGLEWOOD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE FELT GUSHY ON BELT IN PRELOAD, EMPLOYEE CALLED FOR RESPONDER. HAZMAT RESPONDER PICKED UP BOX FROM PRELOAD AND TOOK TO HAZMAT TO PROCESS THROUGH DMP. NO SPILL TO CLEAN UP ON BELT IN PRELOAD.

item.title: Report X-2023110905
item.description:
Report X-2023110905

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-08
  • City: BROOMFIELD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During outbound, at 9:20pm, an unload manager reported a leaking hazmat that he found on the IC rollers. I placed hazmat in plastic bag and a red tote and processed it in QA1. DescribePack: One of the Jerricans had a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed in a plastic bag and red tote.

item.title: Report X-2023110851
item.description:
Report X-2023110851

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-08
  • City: BROOMFIELD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During outbound, at around 8:30pm, a manager reported damaged hazmats that were discovered by a splitter on van line 3. The belt was shutoff; I immediately place the two leaking hazmats as well as the hazmats they leaked on in totes lined with plastic bags. I cleaned up the corrosive spills with paper towels. The hazmats were placed in QA1. DescribePack: The Jerrican has a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed in a plastic bag and tote.

item.title: Report X-2023110935
item.description:
Report X-2023110935

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-10
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic pail without overpack. Loose cap on pail lid allowed leakage which damaged labels. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

  • Description: Approximately 1 ounce of Chemsearch 999 Plus was released from a 30-gallon plastic drum due to improper loading. No storm drains or waterways are reported to be impacted by the release. A contractor was contacted to assist with cleanup of material.

item.title: Report X-2023110967
item.description:
Report X-2023110967

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-13
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to load side due to a leaking hazmat and when arrived pkg was dropped on ground and outer carton was wet. DescribePack: side of the can got punctured from being dropped and liquid leaked out. DurationRel: 20 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2023110577
item.description:
Report X-2023110577

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-26
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the load side having leaked. Upon inspection, contents were found having leaked through the cap most likely due to having gone through the overhead auto sorter. DescribePack: Contents leaked through cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a damage tote with liner and orientation arrows being followed. Leak was contained to package.

item.title: Report X-2023110562
item.description:
Report X-2023110562

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-26
  • City: BROOMFIELD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This hazmat was discovered by a trainer who was loading trailer 136 in load 2 during outbound at around 10:00pm. The trainer discovered the leaking hazmat at the tail end of the trailer and informed manager whom contacted QA. I picked up the hazmat at placed it in a tote/plastic bag and cleaned up the leak inside the trailer with paper towels. I placed hazmat in fumigator. DescribePack: Three of the dispensers are leaking from loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed in a plastic bag and bin.

item.title: Report X-2023110503
item.description:
Report X-2023110503

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: BROOMFIELD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This hazmat was discovered leaking during outbound at around 9:00pm. The package handler who discovered noticed it leaking while transferring hazmat from the IC rollers to trailer 136. The package handler was wearing gloves and says the liquid did not contact their skin. The manager called QA who placed the hazmat in a plastic bag and tote and cleaned floor of trailer. DescribePack: The jug has a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed in a plastic bag and bin.
